author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Driver in Deadly Park Slope Crash Arrested, Charged
text:
The Staten Island driver who struck and killed a 4-year-old girl and 20-month-old boy in Brooklynâ€™s Park Slope neighborhood in March has been indicted, law-enforcement officials said on Thursday morning.
Dorothy Bruns, who told police she had a seizure when she plowed into pedestrians in a crosswalk on March 5, was charged with second-degree manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide by a Brooklyn grand jury, an official said. She was arrested at her Staten Island home on Thursday morning, two officials said, and is expected...
